actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that educational institutions receive a reimbursement for each student commissioned through the Reserve Officer Training Corps (ROTC) program at the institutions.

summary.text: Provides that educational institutions shall receive a reimbursement of $500 for each student commissioned through the Reserve Officer Training Corps (ROTC) program at the institutions. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 2112)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that educational institutions receive a reimbursement for each student commissioned through the Reserve Officer Training Corps (ROTC) program at the institutions.
